description: Unique site visit ID; note the year added as prefix (e.g. \2007_\" or \"2012_\")"
Sequential number of visit to site
Comments and flag explanations for lake info data
GIS record number for site-visit combination
Data qualifier flag for lake info data
Not NHD Lake-reference lake not found in NHD. Not in NHD lake polygon-field location was not found in NHD lake polygon
Latitude (decimal degrees) recorded from the field form (lake verification)
Longitude (decimal degrees) recorded from the field form (lake verification)

Field location source: Index_Site: location where index sample was taken. Launch_Site: point where boat was launched. Map_Loc: Location obtained from design file.  Priority:  lake index site; then launch site, then map location
Explanation of IM_FLAG or comment assigned during QA review

Index visit for lake (used in population estimates).  For sites visited, VISIT_NO=1 is designated as the index visit (even if no samples were collected).  Blank= not assigned (sites not evaluated or not needed). Y=Index visit, N=Not index visit
Index sample for site (YES/NO); typically visit 1)
Index phytoplankton sample for site (YES/NO)-typically the Visit 1 Primary sample
Disturbance category for nutrients for NLA 2012
Index chemistry sample for site (YES/NO)-typically the Visit 1 Primary sample
Sediment core samples (Top, Bottom) used for diatom-inferred chemistry?
Coarse-mesh zooplankton sample collected (using NLA 2007 method)
Fine-mesh zooplankton sample collected (using NLA 2007 method)
